required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Safety of an Inactivated SARS-CoV-2 Vaccine for Prevention of COVID-19 in Children and Adolescents
clinical_study.official_title: Safety Observation of the Inactivated SARS-CoV-2 Vaccine (Vero Cell) in Population Aged 3~17 Years : A Multicenter,Open-label Study

lead_sponsor.agency: Sinovac Research and Development Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This study is a multi-center and open design, phase Ⅳ clinical trial of an inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine (CoronaVac) manufactured by Sinovac Research and Development Co., Ltd.The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety of the SARS-CoV-2 Inactivated vaccine in population aged 3~17 years and in people with pre-existing disease to provide reference for improving the immunization strategy of COVID-19 vaccine.

detailed_description.textblock:
This study is a multi-center and open design, phase Ⅳ clinical trial in population aged 3~17 years . The experimental vaccine will be manufactured by Sinovac Research and Development Co.,Ltd.The study is planned to be carried out in 11 provinces from August 2021 to December 2022, including Liaoning, Heilongjiang, Anhui, Fujian, Jiangxi, Hubei, Guangxi, Chongqing, Guizhou, Yunnan and Gansu. Each province will serve as a research center, and each research center will select the corresponding research site.A total of 33000 subjects including patients with pre-existing will be enrolled with 3000 for each research center, including 600 subjects aged 3~5years，1200 subjects aged 6~11 years,1200 subjects aged 12~17 years.
And subjects will receive two doses of vaccine on day 0 and day 28.

primary_outcome.description: Incidence rate of adverse reactions within 0~7 days after each dose in all populations.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 0-28 days after each dose vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence rate of adverse reactions within 0~28 days after each dose in all populations

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 0~7 days after each dose vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of adverse reactions within 0~7 days after each dose in each age group

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 0~28 days after each dose vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence rate of adverse reactions within 0~28 days after each dose in each age group

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 0~7 days after each dose vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of adverse reactions within 0~7 days after each dose in the population with pre-existing disease.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Within 0~28 days after each dose vaccination
secondary_outcome.description: Incidence of adverse reactions within 0~28 days after each dose in the population with pre-existing disease.

arm_group.description: All of the participants(N=33000) will receive two doses inactivated SARS-CoV-2 vaccine . Vaccine will given by intramuscular injection on day 0 and day 28.

intervention.description: SARS-CoV-2 Inactivated Vaccine 600SU inactivated virus in 0·5 mL of aluminium hydroxide solution per injection
